title.rendered: QLED screen and 50 inches, this Samsung TV now at a minimum price

content.rendered:
The Korean company has become one of the best television manufacturers on the market, offering models with all kinds of options so that any user can find the solution they need. And a clear example of what we say is the Samsung 50Q68A, a device that has an operating system Tizen so you can install all the applications of streaming video platforms. In addition, it has a spectacular design due to the fact that its frames are very small – in this it also helps a lot that its dimensions are only 1,118.3 x 683.6 x 228.8 millimetersincluding its legs.

In order to evaluate the aforementioned adequately, it must be indicated that the screen that you will find on this Smart TV is of 50 inches, dimensions that fit perfectly to fully enjoy games, sports and movies at home. Some of the reasons that exist to say this about this equipment is that it has a resolution 4K, so you will get the most out of what can be seen on services such as Netflix or Amazon Prime Video. In addition, it also has a panel QLED which allows the brightness to be used to be very high while being combined with an excellent range of colors (which makes it compatible with HDR10 + high dynamic range).

Many connections and of all kinds

This section is quite important, and sometimes it is not given due attention. If the device that is purchased does not comply, in the end you will have more than one headache when it comes to connecting accessories or accessing the Internet. The fact is that the TV we are talking about complies perfectly here because, for example, so that you can have everything from your console to a sound bar always available and without having to carry cables in your hand, you will find the following:

  • Three HDMI 2.0 ports (ARC compatible)
  • Optical digital audio output
  • Two USB connections that allow the connection of external drives with multimedia content or can be used to record live broadcasts.
  • DVB-T2CS2 antenna tuner
  • Bluetooth
  • CI+ port
  • Component video input

It’s not bad at all, everything must be said. But there is more: when it comes to connections to access the Internet, you will find both Wi-Fi Dual Band as an Ethernet port, so you will always find the option you need to get the best possible user experience to enjoy content in the cloud. This television is very complete and now has a discount of 120 euros on Amazon.

More important things about this Samsung

One that is currently essential is that it is possible to use the voice assistants most common with this Samsung 50Q68A. Thus, you will not have problems with Google’s own or with Amazon’s Alexa, which will allow you to carry out actions comfortably without having to lift a finger. And, all this, accompanied by a sound system that consists of two channels, so you have access to stereo -and, how can it be otherwise to comply with movies and series, there is support for standards such as Dolby-. You are not missing anything!

The articles listed contain an affiliate link that reports to ADSLZone a small commission for each purchase. The products that appear here have been chosen by the editors for being discounted, and their appearance here has nothing to do with any agreement with the brands.
